location_long_descr:
An important monument of Baroque architecture, a place of pilgrimage with the Church of the Name of the Virgin Mary according to the project of Jan Blažej Santini. It is Santini's largest building on the floor plan of a Greek cross. The complex is masterfully set in the landscape. One of the most visited pilgrimage sites in Moravia.
The pilgrimage complex , masterfully set in the landscape, was created according to the project of JB Santini (1677–1723). At the beginning of the pilgrimage tradition in the Middle Ages stood the Gothic statue of the Madonna , today placed on the main altar.
The entire area is made up of a temple , ambits and the chapel of St. Anne . This complex, together with parish buildings and a castle, is located in the middle of the small village of Křtiny , which lies approximately 20 km northeast of Brno
